scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:app && npm run test:beaconer
scripts.build:webserver: docker build -f $(pwd)/back/microservices/webserver/webserver.Dockerfile --tag $(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_NAME)/webserver:$(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_VERSION) --build-arg GIT=$(sh scripts/env.sh GIT) --build-arg API_PORT=$(sh scripts/env.sh API_PORT) .
scripts.prod:webserver: docker run --name webserver -d -p $(sh scripts/env.sh API_PORT):$(sh scripts/env.sh API_PORT) $(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_NAME)/webserver:$(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_VERSION)

scripts.prod:client: docker run --name client -d $(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_NAME)/client:$(sh scripts/env.sh PROJECT_VERSION)
